remarks: Property of a functional with a closed kernel.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcfl8a.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfl8a.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl8a.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl8a.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfl8a.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfl8a.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfl8a.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfl8a.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfl8a $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) = ( L ` G ) <-> E. x e. V ( L ` G ) = ( ._|_ ` { x } ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d L x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
